chinese: 这个故事有一个浪漫的情节
english: this story has a romantic plot

chinese: 按照这样的顺序，分三步把大象放进冰箱
english: follow the three-step sequence to put the elephant into the fridge
there is a wide variety of tomatoes

chinese: hitherto, the prince's Miss Right has not been here

english: 到目前为止，王子的意中人还没有出现

chinese: the teacher wrote out the correct usage of the word on the board

english: 老师在黑板上写了这个单词的正确用法

chinese: the woman loudly groaned due to her splitting headache

english: 这个女人因剧烈的头痛而大声呻吟起来

chinese: there's a limitation on what he can see
the rooster standing on the field crows at dawn

english: 田野里的公鸡在黎明时分打鸣

chinese: the boat is approaching the jetty at a high speed

english: 这艘船正以很快的速度靠近码头

chinese: many bees live in this hive

english: 这个蜂巢里住了很多蜜蜂

chinese: the old town is ethnically homogeneous compared with the big city

english: 与大城市相比，这个古镇的人口种族单一

chinese: he has no clue about how to solve this complex case

english: 他对如何解决这个复杂的案件毫无头绪

chinese: most sliding doors move inside the grooves

english: 大多数的滑动门都在凹槽里移动

chinese: a bad guy intruded into my house with a knife

english: 一个坏人拿着刀闯入了我的房子
